text: Kɨ kamaghɨn atiati, kɨ magh mangam, eghtɨ faragha otozir bizir kam, ikɨvɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ God na damightɨ, kɨ ian damazibar aghumsɨzir bar dafam inigham. Kɨ kamaghɨn atiatingi, gumazamizir arazir kurar me fomɨra amiziba, me datɨrɨghɨn dagh amuavɨra iti, eghtɨ kɨ mangɨ men ganigh ua me bagh aziam. Me afiar araziba ko, pura tintinibar uari ko akuir araziba ko, aghumsɨzir puvatɨzir araziba, me da tegha navibagh irazir puvatɨ.
